# send(content:to:vlanTag:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Sends a single Ethernet frame over a channel to a specific Ethernet address.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency final func send(content: Data, to remoteAddress: NWEthernetChannel.EthernetAddress, vlanTag: UInt16, completion: @escaping (NWError?) -> Void)
```

## Sending and Receiving Ethernet Frames

- **receiveHandler**: A handler that delivers inbound Ethernet frames.
- **NWEthernetChannel.EthernetAddress**: A 48-bit Ethernet address.

items.description: A handler that delivers inbound Ethernet frames.
items.name: receiveHandler
